document.title: Hot Topic: The 1993 MT AS Salary and Fringe Benefit Survey
document.abstract: The MT AS annual salary and fringe benefit survey for 1993 is complete and shows salary increases for city employees grew at a rate higher than 1992. Hot off the laser printer, here's a summary of the findings.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#6
